item.name: Registering with only the required fields
(-) different emails in the email and username fields
(-)  the wrong email format (without . in the domain name)
(-) the wrong email format (1 symbol after . in the domain name)
(-) the wrong password format (less than 5 characters)
(-) title that differs from the ones suggested on the frontend
